course.subject: TEMG
course.name: T&M Corporate Consulting Project: Google and Open Data Strategy for PCCW-HKT by TalentLabs
course.description: In recent years, Google and the HKSAR government have made available a wealth of open datasets and satellite images capturing geographic information of local transport, environmental pollution, pandemic, IT & broadcasting status. This is an experiential-learning course where students work as consultants to apply critical thinking and design thinking to help a PCCW-HKT business unit imagine new solutions using Google technologies and open datasets in 3D. Students will be equipped to solve this challenge by two faculty and subject experts from Google, PCCW-HKT and TalentLabs. Topics covered in the course includes McKinsey consulting methodology, 3D geographic image processing and rendering, Google cloud technologies, and PCCW-HKT business knowledge. Final deliverables include a business case presentation and a 3D image processing prototype to validate solution viability. Instructor consent is required for this course.
